price: 23. Ma waxaan yeeshaa (Alle) sokadi ilaahyo (kale), hadduu Raxmaanku (Alle) ila doono dhibaato, ayan i tareyn  garab siintoodu waxba, oo aan awoodinba  inay i badbaadiyaan?
arabic: ءَأَتَّخِذُ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ ءَالِهَةً إِن يُرِدۡنِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ بِضُرّٖ لَّا تُغۡنِ عَنِّي شَفَٰعَتُهُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا يُنقِذُونِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: a-attakhidhu min dūnihi ālihatan in yurid'ni al-raḥmānu biḍurrin lā tugh'ni ʿannī shafāʿatuhum shayan walā yunqidhūni
